div.example: function name: demo number of ops: 14 compiled vars: !0 = $a, !1 = $b, !2 = $c, !3 = $d line #* op return operands 2 0 EXT_NOP 1 RECV !0 2 RECV !1 3 RECV !2 4 RECV !3 5 5 EXT_STMT 6 JMPZ !0, ->12 6 7 JMPZ !1, ->12 7 8 JMPNZ !2, ->10 9 JMPZ !3, ->12 9 10 EXT_STMT 11 ECHO 'It\%27s+true\%21' 11 12 EXT_STMT 13 RETURN null
